keyword: how many calories are in a cheese stick
title: How Many Calories Are in a Cheese Stick?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a cheese stick, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Cheese Stick?
assumptions: Standard mozzarella string cheese stick, ~28 g, pasteurized process cheese, no added flavors or coatings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, cheese type, size, and processing; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A typical cheese stick contains about 80 kcal and 7 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Cheddar cheese stick instead of mozzarella

faqs.q: How many calories are in a cheese stick?
faqs.a: About 80 kcal for a standard 28 g mozzarella cheese stick.

faqs.q: What's the protein in one cheese stick?
faqs.a: Typically 7 g of protein per stick.
Very lowâ€”around 1 g carbs and 0 g fiber per stick.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a cheese stick?
faqs.a: About 6 g total fat, including 4 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Does brand affect cheese stick calories?
faqs.a: Yes, low-fat brands may have 50-60 kcal, while full-fat can reach 90-100 kcal.
